content: we all could use a cuddly tiger to go on adventures with this is a free hobbes amigurumi pattern so you too can go exploring the woods with your best pal he loves tuna and beware he likes to pounce on you as soon as you come in through the door happy crocheting and exploring **size ** approximately 14 inches tall sitting **level ** intermediate **need to know ** how to crochet in the round how to crochet in row how to increase and decrease how to assemble parts together stitches used chain single_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch
